name: Coris
long_description:
Coris is building the AI layer for payments risk and operations. We work with the most ambitious platforms, marketplaces, and payment providers around the globe such as GoFundMe, Kajabi, Clio and Cherry to automate and accelerate merchant onboarding, monitoring, and decision-making. What risk teams only imagined two years ago, Coris is delivering today with our risk platform and AI agents.

We’re backed by Y Combinator, Lux Capital, Pathlight Ventures, and other world-class investors — and we’re just getting started !
one_liner: AI-powered risk platform for Payment Providers, Banks, SaaS platforms…
